caption: Figure 2: An overview of the proposed 3DGS-Enhancer framework for 3DGS representation enhancement. We learn 2D video diffusion priors on a large-scale novel view synthesis dataset to enhance the novel views rendered from the 3DGS model on a novel scene. Then, the enhanced views and input views jointly fine-tune the 3DGS model.
description: The figure illustrates the 3DGS-Enhancer framework, which uses 2D video diffusion priors to enhance novel views generated by a 3DGS model and then fine-tunes the model using these enhanced views.
